amendatorysection.bookinfo: Uniform Commercial Code, Reissue Revised Statutes of Nebraska
amendatorysection.para: An action to enforce an obligation, duty, or right arising under this article must be commenced within three years after the cause of action accrues.

annotation.para: This section conforms to the period of limitations set by section 3-118(g) for actions for breach of warranty and to enforce other obligations, duties, or rights arising under article 3.
